name: George PASCOE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Pascoe v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: George PASCOE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of April, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
827 A.2d 1195
George PASCOE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 203 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 21, 2003.
